name: Find My Balls
description:
Find my balls is a very simple, yet extremely addictive crazy puzzle game, where you have to ‘find your balls’.

Your balls are blasted on to the board, whereupon they bounce around the board and eventually become invisible. Here’s the crazy part - whilst invisible, your balls keep on moving and YOU need to watch for tell tales as the balls bounce off the edges, other balls and a wide variety of board obstacles. Once the ball has come to a rest you tap the board to indicate where you think your ball is. If you get it right, then it’s on to the next more challenging level.

Sounds simple, easy eh? No chance! What are you waiting for? It’s time to find your balls!

Features:

* 100 levels of crazy ball blasting fun!
* Lots of cute balls for you to play with
* Fully optimised for all devices
* Simple to play, but very hard to master
